question: Who among the following was recently charged for ball-tampering?
explanation: Australian skipper Steve Smith & batsman Cameron Bancroft have admitted to charges of ball-tampering during the 3rd day of the third Test match against South Africa in Cape Town. Bancroft was caught on television cameras appearing to rub a yellow object on the ball during the match. Australia captain Steve Smith and vice-captain David Warner have decided to relinquish their leadership duties.
